timeline.message:
Add more OOL test cases

- Fix: clear OOL cache between runs
- Add scenarios for big world v3 for marine with artillery selection testing.
  Shows a few bad casualty selections in current code.
- Add test case to check heavy bomber technology
- Add OOL selection ordering test cases for naval units

timeline.bodyText: Worth noting, was surprising to see OOL taken in this order. Am I doing the math wrong perhaps to expect tank to be last in this case?
timeline.author: DanVanAtta
